# SoftwareONE CLI
Command line utility for SoftwareOne Marketplace Platform

# Run tests
```
$ docker-compose build app_test
$ docker-compose run --service-ports app_test
```

# Command Line Interface
To list all available commands use


```
mpt-cli --help
```
